WorkItem.Description: It's showing as 108 crit rating and 856 attack power as static stats while also having the AP buff as the proc.

Comments.Message: I am getting the same issue and it seems as if Rawr is not taking into account any of the procs at all, at least for the cat model, since it is rating the Flare of the Heavens as the second best trinket for me above such trinkets as wrathstone and Mirror of Truth.

Flare's proc doesn't seemed to be modelled correctly but that's another issue, it might work for cat like Necromantic worked for Unholy DKs if our dots still proc similar things but anywho I'm going offtopic here. ~_~
Known issue.  Read the release notes / readme file.
Oh, and for a fix, just edit the item, and remove the static AP from the scrolling stat list.  That should do it in the meantime.
